data.title: ‘Another Act’: Actress Regina Hall on the coronavirus relief special and ‘Black Monday’
data.meta_description: In this week’s episode of Another Act, The Undefeated’s Kelley Carter is joined by actress Regina Hall, who is participating in a coronavirus relief special cal…
data.text:
O’Shea Jackson Jr. talks ‘Cocaine Bear’ and choosing Hollywood

‘I grew up on sets my whole life, it’s something that I feel comfortable in’

Gail Bean reveals what she learned from portraying Wanda on ‘Snowfall’

Also, she describes her journey in Hollywood and walking into ‘P-Valley’, plus check out who you should be watching

Bashir Salahuddin talks ‘Sherman’s Showcase’ and ‘South Side’ on ‘Another Act with Kelley Carter’

‘It really does represent decades and decades of education and hard work and struggle and also passion’

Omari Hardwick joins ‘Another Act with Kelley Carter’ to talk new film ‘Fantasy Football’

He describes merging his life as an athlete with acting, the ‘Power’ universe, his career and more

Anika Noni Rose discusses new series ‘Let the Right One In,’ revisits pivotal roles

The star also goes in depth about roles for women in Hollywood and her contribution

Actor Michael Ealy discusses ‘Reasonable Doubt’ and his journey in Hollywood

Also, he describes how his characters — good or bad — show his broad range as an actor

Viola Davis discusses the fight for ‘The Woman King’ and those offscreen

‘I fight for the people who are on the periphery, the unknowns, the outliers, the people on the sidelines who’ve never had a seat at the table’

Stephan James discusses versatility in Black male roles and new series ‘Surface’

‘I think that’s a part of the decision-making for me, that I’m continuing to check boxes in my career …’

Nicco Annan explores the pivotal character Uncle Clifford in ‘P-Valley’

‘I think the revolution is to be able to see a person accept themselves …’

Brandee Evans discusses ‘P-Valley’ and embracing the role of Mercedes

The actress and dancer opens up about being a caregiver and why she works so hard

Mykelti Williamson on ‘Law and Order: Organized Crime,’ ‘Forrest Gump’ and longevity

‘I want to be able to latch onto something that no one’s ever heard of before’

‘Another Act’: Magic Johnson explains why it was time to tell his story

The NBA legend opens up about his journey and new doc, ‘They Call Me Magic’

‘Another Act’: Actor Sasheer Zamata discusses new season of ‘Woke’

Also, she talks about her role in ‘Home Economics,’ her friendship with actress/comedian Nicole Byer and more

‘Another Act’: Damson Idris on becoming the lead star in ‘Snowfall’

Also, he talks about the impact that the late John Singleton still has on the show

‘Another Act’: Actress Kyla Pratt shares details of ‘The Proud Family: Louder and Prouder’

Also, she talks about the power of representation and the joy of setting an example for her own daughters

‘Another Act’: Joseph Sikora describes role on ‘Power Book IV: Force’

Also, he opens up about his white character in a mostly Black cast and the time 50 Cent took him to the ’hood

‘Another Act’: Yara Shahidi discusses the new season of ‘grown-ish’ and life as an actual college student

Also, she talks about saying goodbye to ‘black-ish’ and her work as a producer and activist

‘Another Act’: Quvenzhané Wallis discusses her role in the new series, ‘Swagger’

Also, she talks about her journey in Hollywood after her success in the film ‘Annie’

‘Another Act’: Halle Berry sits down with Kelley Carter to discuss her new Netflix film ‘Bruised’

Also, why it was important for her to tell stories about Black women

‘Another Act’: Zazie Beetz opens up about Netflix Western ‘The Harder They Fall’ and FX’s ‘Atlanta’

She also explains why her hair always plays a part in her roles

‘Another Act’: Issa Rae sheds light on the final season of HBO’s ‘Insecure’

Also, Rae opens up about providing a blueprint for success in Hollywood and her new projects

‘Another Act’: Rap legend RZA discusses the revealing new season of ‘Wu-Tang: An American Saga’

Plus, he talks about working with Quentin Tarantino, new music and his influence on the culture

‘Another Act’: Dule Hill talks about traveling back to the 1960s for his role in ‘The Wonder Years’

Also, he describes ‘The West Wing’ and playing a TV dad for the first time

‘Another Act’: Emmys 2021 Pre-Show with Kelley Carter

Carter breaks down this year’s categories and why these nominees from her show stand out

‘Another Act’: Jennifer Hudson on portraying icon Aretha Franklin in ‘Respect’

Also, she talks about how she stepped into a new role as a producer and what’s next for her career

‘Another Act’: Jamie Hector on the final season of ‘Bosch’ and his new HBO series

How he went from playing a drug ‘businessman’ in ‘The Wire’ to a detective, and how he helps his community

Hoop Stories with Marc J. Spears

Laugh, cry and listen to rare stories delivered in detail by Andscape’s senior NBA writer Marc Spears, who also uses animations of his times with the greatest athletes.

Sneaker Box

In the world of everything shoes, 'Sneaker Box' follows Andscape's writer Aaron Dodson as he talks sneakers with athletes, musicians and other celebrities.

'One on One' with Marc Spears

Athletes and their lives off the court collide in one-on-one conversations with ballers and Andscape’s senior sports reporter Marc Spears.

The Roundtable

Andscape's signature show with hosts Domonique Foxworth, Justin Tinsley, Lonnae O’Neal and guests as they break down the most tantalizing trends in black culture.

James Wiseman Diary

Andscape's senior NBA writer Marc J. Spears chronicles the rookie season of Golden State Warrior’s top draft pick James Wiseman, who provides exclusive access and insight into his life as a pro.

Black and Brilliant

Here are stories of talented individuals – from a tech CEO to an animation filmmaker to the first black female justice on the New Jersey Supreme Court – who have overcome adversity and changed society. Andscape goes in-depth with a firsthand view of what makes them truly great.

Leading the Charge

WNBA stars discuss what it’s like to use their platform and advocate for social change as members of one of the most socially active leagues in sports.

Not So Daily Plug

A current look at news and notes around the world of culture and sports

Roundball Rap

Weekly NBA talk on the latest news and stories with Kenyon Martin and Marc Spears.

Andscape Originals

Treat yourself to something quick and fulfilling as Andscape serves your needs with a series of original specials.

Trae Young Diaries

Andscape's senior NBA writer Marc J. Spears chronicles the second season of Atlanta Hawks star point guard Trae Young, who provides exclusive access and insight into his life as a pro.

Andscape Music Videos

Andscape brings you unmatched music storytelling, featuring stars you love and newcomers to the scene.

Town Halls

Andscape convenes athletes, community leaders, cultural figures and others to discuss the most challenging issues of our time.

I Don't Give A Damn with Domonique Foxworth

Andscape's senior writer Domonique Foxworth is a former NFL defensive back who doesn’t water down his hot takes.

The Style of Swagger

From runway appearances to extensive shoe collections, athletes have become the new fashion icons. Take an exclusive peek into their closets to see how they define style.

HBCU Heroes

Andscape gives you the latest on black college campus culture, and the people who make HBCUs survive and thrive.

Cover Three

A rotating cast of analysts breaks down the latest NFL news and provides insight with an Andscape slant.

On Site

Andscape takes you to events you won’t want to miss, live on Twitter.

Allow Me to Introduce Myself

Say hello to the unknown and underrated, and no longer invisible, as Andscape introduces you to sports stars whose stories you should know.

View From the Hilltop

View From the Hilltop takes you into the locker room as well as into the personal lives of the Howard players eager to dominate their conference and earn respect among the nation’s historically black college athletic programs during the 2016-17 season. Produced by Senior Sports Writer Jerry Bembry.
